intent.user_query: Calculate the month-over-month growth rate of total sales.

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT CurrMonth, (CurrMonthSales - PrevMonthSales) / PrevMonthSales AS GrowthRate FROM (SELECT CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SaleDate) AS VARCHAR(4)) || '-' || CAST(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SaleDate) AS VARCHAR(2)) AS CurrMonth, SUM(TotalAmount) AS CurrMonthSales, LAG(SUM(TotalAmount), 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SaleDate) AS VARCHAR(4)) || '-' || CAST(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SaleDate) AS VARCHAR(2))) AS PrevMonthSales FROM fitness_db.Sales GROUP BY 1) AS Subquery WHERE PrevMonthSales > 0;

arguments.sql: SELECT CurrMonth, (CurrMonthSales - PrevMonthSales) / PrevMonthSales AS GrowthRate FROM (SELECT CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SaleDate) AS VARCHAR(4)) || '-' || CAST(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SaleDate) AS VARCHAR(2)) AS CurrMonth, SUM(TotalAmount) AS CurrMonthSales, LAG(SUM(TotalAmount), 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY CAST(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SaleDate) AS VARCHAR(4)) || '-' || CAST(EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SaleDate) AS VARCHAR(2))) AS PrevMonthSales FROM fitness_db.Sales GROUP BY 1) AS Subquery WHERE PrevMonthSales > 0;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
